text: Aldo Brovarone (24 June 1926 – 12 October 2020) was an Italian automobile designer. He was the chief stylist for Pininfarina. He was known for his works including the Ferrari Dino GTS, Lancia Gamma Coupé and the Peugeot 504 and 504 Coupé. Brovarone was born in Vigliano Biellese, Italy. Brovarone died on 12 October 2020 in Turin, Italy at the age of 94. ==References== Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Italian mechanical engineers Category:2020 deaths Category:1926 births Category:People from Piedmont
